title: Periodic error in MetricServer
body:
**Description**
Periodic error in MetricServer on `master`.

**Steps to Reproduce**
In order to replicate the behavior, please provide a detailed list of steps:
Run with `--Metrics.Enabled=true` and `--Metrics.ExposePort=6065`

**Actual behavior**
syslog reports errors periodically

**Expected behavior**
no error

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
Please provide the following information regarding your setup:
 - Operating System: Linux Mint 21.2
 - Version: v1.24.0-unstable+f3ed968e
 - Installation Method: Build from source
 - Consensus Client: (all)

**Logs**
Please include any relevant logs that may help identify the issue.

```
Dec 26 10:00:48 earth nethermind: Error in MetricServer: System.Net.HttpListenerException (0x80131620): Unable to write data to the transport connection: Cannot access a disposed object.#012Object name: 'System.Net.Sockets.Socket'..#012   at System.Net.HttpResponseStream.BeginWriteCore(Byte[] buffer, Int32 offset, Int32 size, AsyncCallback cback, Object state)#012   at System.Net.HttpResponseStream.BeginWrite(Byte[] buffer, Int32 offset, Int32 count, AsyncCallback callback, Object state)#012   at System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory`1.FromAsyncTrim[TInstance,TArgs](TInstance thisRef, TArgs args, Func`5 beginMethod, Func`3 endMethod)#012   at System.IO.Stream.BeginEndWriteAsync(Byte[] buffer, Int32 offset, Int32 count)#012   at System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync(Byte[] buffer, Int32 offset, Int32 count, CancellationToken cancellationToken)#012   at Prometheus.TextSerializer.WriteFamilyDeclarationAsync(String name, Byte[] nameBytes, Byte[] helpBytes, MetricType type, Byte[] typeBytes, CancellationToken cancel)#012   at Prometheus.Collector`1.CollectAndSerializeAsync(IMetricsSerializer serializer, Boolean writeFamilyDeclaration, CancellationToken cancel)#012   at Prometheus.CollectorFamily.CollectAndSerializeAsync(IMetricsSerializer serializer, CancellationToken cancel)#012   at Prometheus.CollectorRegistry.CollectAndSerializeAsync(IMetricsSerializer serializer, CancellationToken cancel)#012   at Prometheus.MetricServer.<>c__DisplayClass8_1.<<StartServer>b__1>d.MoveNext()
```
